conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true cutaway 3D model: walls extruded with thickness, angled/isometric view, interior volume readable, and ceiling/roof removed to expose rooms.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Strong 3D extrusion with readable wall corners and separate floor plane; clean cutaway. Minor simplifications in some wall edge/corner detailing and openings.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall room set and adjacency largely match (left twin bedroom, central bath cluster, master bedroom, living area, kitchen/dining). Some proportional/layout drift (room sizes/angles and corridor openness) and openings are not perfectly consistent with the 2D plan.

interior_elements.notes: Beds, living seating, dining table, kitchen counters/appliances, and bathroom fixtures are present and generally placed in the correct rooms; a few elements are simplified and scales are slightly generalized.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean render with distinct walls/floors and good visibility; minimal artifacts. Some openings/door swings are less crisp vs the 2D plan, but overall readability is high.

detected_errors.description: Minor layout/proportion deviations from the 2D plan (room dimensions/angles and some partition positioning differ slightly).
Doors/windows/openings are present but not all appear to match the 2D plan exactly in placement/count.

summary: A clear true 3D cutaway conversion with strong overall layout fidelity, with only moderate proportional drift and minor door/window placement mismatches versus the 2D plan.
